title: Inmate with 'survivalist skills' who escaped Pennsylvania jail is in custody after manhunt
description: The manhunt for the escaped Pennsylvania inmate who is suspected in several crimes, including the murder of a New York woman, ended Saturday evening, state police said.

title: Ron DeSantis’ campaign finances have some flashing warning signs
description: Ron DeSantis tapped out top donors and burned cash in his first six weeks as a 2024 candidate, according to an analysis of his campaign finance disclosure.

title: At least 4 killed in mass shooting in small Georgia city outside Atlanta, spokeswoman says
description: A county government official in Georgia says at least four people have been killed in a mass shooting in a small community south of Atlanta.

title: RFK Jr. pushes back on report he said Covid-19 was ethnically targeted to spare Jews
description: The presidential candidate disputed a report that quoted him saying Covid is “targeted to attack Caucasians and Black people” and that Jewish people are most immune.

title: 'He was a protector': Friends say Oregon man died while defending LGBTQ friend
description: Friends say Colin Smith, who was fatally stabbed in Portland, Oregon, on July 2, died protecting a friend who was facing anti-LGBTQ harassment.

title: Escaped murder suspect with 'survivalist skills' spotted on doorbell camera
description: As the intense manhunt continues for an escaped inmate with 'survivalist skills' who is suspected of murder, police revealed he recently was spotted on a doorbell camera in Pennsylvania.

title: Doctor found liable for battery of a teen girl and accused of abusing another is still practicing medicine
description: Dr. Martin Seth Forman, a pediatrician based in Virginia, still has his medical license despite being found liable in civil court for battery of a 15-year-old girl.

title: A determined mom and a veteran police officer who said this is 'solvable' revived the Gilgo Beach probe
description: A determined mom and a veteran police officer revived the search for the Gilgo Beach murder suspect.

title: Heat, flooding and smoke: The U.S. is in the midst of a summer of extremes
description: The word of the summer is “extreme.”

title: Japan says it's safe to release radioactive Fukushima water — so why are its neighbors freaking out?
description: South Korea’s official endorsement of the plan has done little to put its public at ease, as officials cope with panic-buying, protests and consumer boycotts.

title: Iowa evangelicals feel under attack — and many don’t see Trump as their savior
description: Evangelicals have enormous influence over the outcome of next year’s Iowa caucuses — and it’s a group that is fond of Trump but not completely wedded to him.

title: LIVE BLOG
description: An “extremely dangerous heat wave” will plague the western and southern parts of the country over the weekend, forecasters warned early Saturday.

title: These movies are on hold because of the SAG-AFTRA strike
description: "Mission: Impossible 8" and "Gladiator 2" are among the movies that are pausing filming because of the actors strike.

title: For some GOP candidates at the Family Leadership Summit, the biggest challenge was Tucker Carlson
description: A number of candidates stumbled in interviews with former Fox News host Tucker Carlson at the Family Leadership Summit, while Trump skipped out on the event altogether.

title: Gilgo Beach victim’s mother lashes out at suspected serial killer
description: Lynn Barthelemy, whose daughter Melissa's remains were found on Gilgo Beach in Long Island, says she hopes the suspected serial killer will "suffer" in prison.
